typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 2,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmailsHeader
EmailsHeader keyGenerate(output(rownum as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AddRowNums
AddRowNums derive(datalines = iif(!isNull(toInteger(left(toString(byPosition(1)),1))),toInteger(rownum),toInteger(0))) ~> DefineDataLines
DefineDataLines aggregate() ~> FindFirstLine
FindFirstLine sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['HeaderSelect.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Sink
